scripts.lint-lab1: echo Running HTMLLint && grunt lab1 && echo Running CSSLint && csslint ../projects/lab1/PB17000209/style.css && echo Running StyleLint && stylelint ../projects/lab1/PB17000209/style.css
scripts.lint-lab2: echo Running HTMLLint && grunt lab2 && echo Running CSSLint && csslint ../projects/lab2/PB17000209/style.css && echo Running ESLint && eslint ../projects/lab2/PB17000209/app.js -c .eslintrc.js && echo Running StyleLint && stylelint ../projects/lab2/PB17000209/style.css
